act_info.full_title: Sickle Cell Disease Awareness Day and Thalassemia Awareness Day Act, 2021, S.O. 2021, c. 22
act_info.act_name_text: Sickle Cell Disease Awareness Day and Thalassemia Awareness Day Act, 2021

content.content: 1 June 19 in each year is proclaimed as Sickle Cell Disease Awareness Day.
content.raw_html: 1 June 19 in each year is proclaimed as Sickle Cell Disease Awareness Day.

content.content: 2 May 8 in each year is proclaimed as Thalassemia Awareness Day. 3 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
2 May 8 in each year is proclaimed as Thalassemia Awareness Day.

3 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
